## Lab 1

```{r}
storms %>%
  group_by(name,year) %>%
  filter(max(category,na.rm=T)==5) %>%
  ggplot(aes(long,lat,color=name)) +
  geom_path() +
  borders("world") +
  coord_quickmap(xlim=c(-130,-60),
                 ylim=c(20,50))
```

## Lab 3

```{r}
mean = 160
sd = 20
data <- rnorm(600,mean,sd)

hist(data,
     main=paste0('Normal dist. Mean: ',
                 as.character(round(mean(data),2)),
                 ', sd: ',
                 as.character(round(sd(data),2))))
```

```{r}
n = 1e5
x <- rchisq(n,3)
x_bar = mean(x)

var_x <- sum(((x-x_bar)**2)/(n-1))

tibble(x=data) |>
  mutate(mean=mean(x),
            variance=var_x,
            `standard deviation` = sd(x))
```

```{r}
chi_sq_samples <-
  tibble(x=c(rchisq(n,1) + rchisq(n,1),
             rchisq(n,3),
             rchisq(n,4)),
         df=rep(c(as.character(2:4)),each=n))

chi_sq_samples |>
  ggplot(aes(x,fill=df)) +
  geom_density(alpha=.5) +
  labs(fill='df',x='sample')
```
